places.formattedAddress: 2109 W Great Neck Rd #102, Virginia Beach, VA 23451

text.text: People say this restaurant offers delicious sushi, seafood, and burgers, as well as a variety of drinks. They highlight the fresh oysters, scallops, and tuna tataki, and the lively atmosphere with great water views of Long Creek, perfect for happy hour, family dinners, or date nights. They also like the friendly and accommodating staff.

places.formattedAddress: 4408 Shore Dr, Virginia Beach, VA 23455

text.text: People say this cafe offers delicious brunch, sandwiches, and desserts, including the popular sweet potato biscuit. They highlight the fresh, farm-to-table ingredients, the unique and charming atmosphere with outdoor seating and friendly animals, and the attentive service. They also like the bakery with a variety of pastries and the option to walk to the waterfront.

places.formattedAddress: Delta Hotels by Marriott Virginia Beach Waterfront Suites, 2800 Shore Dr, Virginia Beach, VA 23451

text.text:
People say this seafood restaurant offers delicious crab cakes, gnocchi, and salmon. They also highlight the attentive staff, friendly service, and beautiful ocean views.

Other reviews mention the food can be overpriced.

places.formattedAddress: 401 N Great Neck Rd #129, Virginia Beach, VA 23454

text.text: People say this Italian restaurant serves delicious chicken parmesan, pasta with salmon, and seafood omelets. They highlight the artful presentation of dishes, the fresh and plentiful seafood, and the well-seasoned food. They also like the relaxing atmosphere and friendly staff.

places.formattedAddress: 1658 Pleasure House Rd Suite 101, Virginia Beach, VA 23455

text.text: People say this restaurant serves delicious avocado toast, cinnamon rolls, and souffle pancakes. They highlight the generous portions, the fast service, and the friendly staff. They also like the mimosa flights and the comfortable, casual atmosphere.

places.formattedAddress: 1608 Pleasure House Rd, Virginia Beach, VA 23455

text.text: Diners say this American restaurant serves up delicious lamb burgers, scallops, and a giant pretzel, and has a fantastic beer selection. They also highlight the friendly and helpful service, and the relaxed vibe.

places.formattedAddress: 1716 Pleasure House Rd #101, Virginia Beach, VA 23455

text.text: People say this restaurant offers a wide selection of craft beers, delicious burgers, and a tasty mega pretzel. They highlight the generous portions, reasonable prices, and fun, welcoming atmosphere. They also like the friendly and attentive service.

places.formattedAddress: 4600 Lookout Rd, Virginia Beach, VA 23455

text.text:
Diners say this American restaurant serves delicious seafood nachos, butternut squash gnocchi, and steak. They also highlight the friendly and helpful staff, and cozy ambiance.

Some reviews mention the food can be overpriced.

places.formattedAddress: 4549 Commerce St, Virginia Beach, VA 23462

text.text:
People say this restaurant offers a huge selection of beer, and the steak and calamari are delicious. They also highlight the fun atmosphere, clean environment, and friendly service.

Some reviews mention the music can be loud.

places.formattedAddress: 5641 Indian River Rd, Virginia Beach, VA 23464
4501 Main St, Virginia Beach, VA 23462

text.text:
People say this restaurant serves delicious chicken and waffles, biscuits with blueberry jam, and fried green tomatoes. They also highlight the warm and inviting atmosphere, and the attentive service.

Other reviews mention the food can be overcooked.

places.formattedAddress: 5824 Northampton Blvd #102, Virginia Beach, VA 23455

text.text: People say this restaurant serves unique and flavorful poke bowls, crispy wings, and on-point dumplings. They highlight the fresh ingredients, full flavor spectrum, and reasonable pricing. They also like the friendly and attentive staff, and the clean and inviting atmosphere.

places.formattedAddress: 3333 Virginia Beach Blvd UNIT 17, Virginia Beach, VA 23452

displayName.text: Jimmy G's Chop House & Bistro Bar

text.text: People say this fine dining restaurant offers delicious food and drinks. They highlight the friendly and attentive staff, and the beautiful, relaxed atmosphere. They also like the great value of the happy hour plates.

places.formattedAddress: 1801 Pleasure House Rd #110, Virginia Beach, VA 23455
3152 Shore Dr, Virginia Beach, VA 23451

text.text: People say this brunch restaurant serves delicious shrimp and grits, and a standout sausage. They highlight the fresh, organic, and local ingredients, and the chill, laid-back vibe. They also like the friendly and accommodating staff.

places.formattedAddress: 1440 N Great Neck Rd, Virginia Beach, VA 23454

text.text: People say this seafood restaurant serves good bread and shrimp appetizer. They highlight the nice atmosphere. They also like the good service.

places.formattedAddress: 928 Diamond Springs Rd #135, Virginia Beach, VA 23455

text.text:
People say this restaurant serves delicious appetizers, chicken and waffles, lamb chops, and oxtail hash. They also highlight the attentive and friendly staff, and the beautiful, lively atmosphere.

Other reviews mention the food can be overpriced.

places.formattedAddress: 5650 Virginia Beach Blvd #106, Virginia Beach, VA 23462

text.text: People say this Argentinian restaurant serves delicious beef and chicken empanadas, skirt steak sandwiches, and grilled chicken sandwiches. They highlight the fresh food, generous portions, and reasonable prices. They also like the friendly and welcoming staff.

places.formattedAddress: 1270 Diamond Springs Rd #102, Virginia Beach, VA 23455

text.text: People say this cafe offers delicious brunch, including shrimp and grits, waffles, and pancakes, as well as vegan options and mimosas. They highlight the fresh ingredients, generous portions, and reasonable prices. They also like the welcoming atmosphere and friendly, attentive service.

places.formattedAddress: 2880 Virginia Beach Blvd, Virginia Beach, VA 23452

text.text: People say this steakhouse offers delicious picanha, ribeye, and filet mignon steaks, as well as flavorful appetizers like mussels, empanadas, and octopus. They highlight the generous portions, the tableside presentation of the picanha, and the creamy mashed potatoes. They also like the cozy and inviting atmosphere, perfect for a date night, and the attentive and friendly service.
